name: Little Isles
description:
This is the first-ever game that I finished, it is also my first ever attempt at a VR game.

In the game you are stranded on an island and have to survival night after night of zombies. Whilst the zombies get stronger you'll have to find things on the island that will help you survive, the longer your survive and the more kills you get, the higher your score.

Game made by Draak_5
